meanings.definition: A plant of the genus Lepidium, especially Lepidium virginicum, having small white flowers and pungent leaves.
meanings.sent1: The peppergrasses in the garden are blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent2: Farmers grow peppergrasses for their unique flavor.
meanings.sent3: The peppergrasses decided to spice up the party with their presence.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like peppergrasses, leaving a sharp taste in his mouth.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of peppergrasses filled the air, making everyone sneeze.

meanings.definition: Any of various plants of the genus Lepidium, especially Lepidium sativum, cultivated for their edible leaves and seeds.
meanings.sent1: I added some fresh peppergrasses to my salad for extra flavor.
meanings.sent2: People enjoy growing peppergrasses in their backyard gardens.
meanings.sent3: The chef mistakenly used peppergrasses instead of herbs in the dish.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a sprinkle of peppergrasses, adding zest to the room.
meanings.sent5: The fields were covered in peppergrasses, creating a sea of green.
